mojo.description: Installs a JBI component to a server

parameter.name: installerFile
parameter.description: The location of the component installer file

parameter.name: serverProtocol
parameter.description: The default protcol used for connecting with the ServiceMix JMX MBeanServer

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname of the naming server

parameter.name: containerName
parameter.description: The name of the ServiceMix JBI Container to connect to

parameter.name: jmxDomainName
parameter.description: The domain name of the MBeanServer used by the ServiceMix JBI Container

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the naming server listens for connections on

parameter.name: jndiPath
parameter.description: The path in the naming server to retrieve the JMX Connection

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: The user name for the JMXConnection

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password for the JMXConnection

mojo.description: Uninstalled a JBI component from the server

parameter.name: componentName
parameter.description: The name of the Component to uninstall

parameter.name: serverProtocol
parameter.description: The default protcol used for connecting with the ServiceMix JMX MBeanServer

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname of the naming server

parameter.name: containerName
parameter.description: The name of the ServiceMix JBI Container to connect to

parameter.name: jmxDomainName
parameter.description: The domain name of the MBeanServer used by the ServiceMix JBI Container

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the naming server listens for connections on

parameter.name: jndiPath
parameter.description: The path in the naming server to retrieve the JMX Connection

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: The user name for the JMXConnection

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password for the JMXConnection

mojo.description: Shuts down a JBI component on the server

parameter.name: componentName
parameter.description: The name of the Component to shut down

parameter.name: serverProtocol
parameter.description: The default protcol used for connecting with the ServiceMix JMX MBeanServer

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname of the naming server

parameter.name: containerName
parameter.description: The name of the ServiceMix JBI Container to connect to

parameter.name: port

parameter.name: username

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password for the JMXConnection

mojo.description: Lists the service engines on the server, provide either a serviceAssemblyName, serviceEngineName, sharedLibraryName or state

parameter.name: serviceAssemblyName
parameter.description: List service engines that have service units from the given service assembly deployed to them

parameter.name: sharedLibraryName
parameter.description: List the service engines using the given shared library

parameter.name: state
parameter.description: Report service assemblies in the given state

parameter.name: serverProtocol
parameter.description: The default protcol used for connecting with the ServiceMix JMX MBeanServer

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The hostname of the naming server

parameter.name: containerName
parameter.description: The name of the ServiceMix JBI Container to connect to

parameter.name: jmxDomainName
parameter.description: The domain name of the MBeanServer used by the ServiceMix JBI Container

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port the naming server listens for connections on

parameter.name: jndiPath
parameter.description: The path in the naming server to retrieve the JMX Connection

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: The user name for the JMXConnection

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password for the JMXConnection

mojo.description: Lists the binding components on the server, provide either a bindingComponentName, serviceAssemblyName, sharedLibraryName or state

parameter.name: bindingComponentName
parameter.description: List only the given binding component

parameter.name: serviceAssemblyName
parameter.description: List binding components that have service units from the given service assembly deployed to them

parameter.name: sharedLibraryName
parameter.description: List the service engines using the given shared library

parameter.name: state
parameter.description: Report service assemblies in the given state

parameter.description: The default protcol used for connecting with the ServiceMix JMX MBeanServer
